ygData.subject: RE: Smithing and mold question
ygData.msgSnippet: Large molds are available in everfrost peaks in the cave that leads to Halas
ygData.messageBody:
Large molds are available in everfrost peaks in the cave that leads to Halas

> I know in freeprot they sell the medium size molds. They are in east
> freeport at a place call itkars armor or something like that. They dont
> call them "medium" molds..just gorget mold....bracer mold etc. But they
> are

> molds.
